titleStmt.title: Notes upon the Phœnix edition of the Pastoral letter Part I / by Samvel Johnson.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.

notesStmt.note: A criticism of "A pastoral letter ... concerning the oaths of allegiance and supremacy to K. William and Q. Mary," by Bishop Burnet.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
